advancements.charmony-mooblooms.moobloom: Mooblooms spawn flowers where they walk and can be milked for suspicious stew.
advancements.charmony-mooblooms.milked_m: Milk a Moobloom and get some suspicious stew
advancements.charmony-mooblooms.milked_r: Find and milk a rare moobloom
advancements.charmony-mooblooms.sheared_: Use shears on a Moobloom to get a flower
